lines.text: Doctor, why do those types
[motions with hands]
keep thinking that I'm one of them?

Well, Wally, because you *are* one of them. You are gay. You are gay. You are a homosexual. The opposite of straight, you're gay. I know it. Your family knows it. DOGS know it! Everyone seems to know it except you.
Were the handcuffs totally necessary, officer?
Well, actually, that was your husband's idea.
Kids, where's your Father?
He's upstairs masturbating to gay porn.
Again?
Sorry we're a few hours late, there, Ma, but you know how the kids... uh... hate old people.
So I hear dad's dead. Hey, is that egg nog?
Baby... get in the vehicle, baby!
I'm not getting in that vehicle!
Baby, this is my gift to you!
What? Gift? That's not a gift, you freakin' stole this!
I stole it to make it up to you, baby.

[sobbing]
Well, tell me this, then - how could you sleep with my best friend and then tell me about it?
Sure I told you about it, baby, but don't shoot the messenger!
Hello, is your *uncle* home?
Uncle? Oh, yeah. Just a moment.

[calls upstairs suggestively]
Uncle Chris!
Uncle? What, are we playing *that* game again?
Hey, didya see that, uh, Nina Bedford show this morning?
Yeah, that uh... thing about toast-fucking.
...toast-fucking?
Yeah - it's the new thing where you fuck or get fucked with toast.
No, the... the show this morning was about that new drug.
Oh. Must have been a dream I had.
[after being brought home by the police]
There's a perfectly reasonable explanation for this.
Please don't.
Well, I was out driving. 'Cause you know how much I love driving. When suddenly, I had to take the *biggest pee in the world*! So I went to this washroom...
[Wally's family goes inside and locks him out]
...but it was full of those *types*! You know. QUEERS and QUEENIES and...
Did you clean the house? Yeah, good boy. Did you clean the office? Yeah, good. How about the gun? Did you clean the gun?
[Wanders in, drops his briefcase. A shot is fired]
Ah! My foot!
[Another shot]
Ah! My other foot!
[looking into a microscope]
This urine is great!
I've invented a pill that gives worms to ex-girlfriends.
Uh, right, and what's positive about that?
Well, it's a pill that gives worms to ex-girlfriends.
Couldn't it also give worms to ex-boyfriends?
This is a drug... for the world... to give worms to ex-girlfriends.
Well, great. Thanks for stopping by.
You just don't get it here! Huhoooo!
"Life is short, life is shit, and soon it will be over."
Cat on my head.
[shouts]
Cat on my head!

[looking at drug]
What will this do?
Well, it reaches into your brain "chemically," and then it locates your happiest memory "chemically," then it locks onto that emotion and freezes it "chemically," and then it keeps you happy, happy.
Chris? She's depressed, not stupid!
Okay, I was driving around last night in my sixty-two thousand dollar car. And I was trying to think of a name for the drug, then it hit me.
The name?
No a bird, it hit my windshield. When that happened, I got depressed.
Not you, Cisco!

Yeah, even me. But as soon as I got depressed, I got undepressed. 'Cause as I was cleaning the gleaming guts of that bird off my car, I thought of a name for the drug - Gleemonex. The slogan - Gleemonex makes it feel like it seventy-two degrees in your head... all... the... time!
You... are... scum! Do you hear me soldier?
Yes, sir!
Do you know what we are going to be doing today?
No, sir!
We are going to be doing push-ups all day, you and me, all day!
[Wally smiles]
Do you think that's funny soldier?
No, sir!
Well, just for that, you are going to be doing those push-ups with me lying on your back! You are going to discover muscles, you never knew you had! Big... muscles, hard... muscles!
Oh, yesss, sir!
[Wally's squad is watching naked men shower]

[to Wally]
You go over there and Fuck 'em. We'll stay here and Masturbate. Go, go, go!
Ya know, the pills are made of monkey cum.
Hey, look! I'm an elephant rider! Huh? Ya like that?
When we come back we're going to give Dr. Cooper a complete makeover.

[holding out cappuccino cup to assistant]
My cap is luke.
Lukewarm, Chris?
No, Luke Skywalker, you fuckin' inbred.
No. It's been two weeks and I don't feel any different. All I've done is gain eight pounds. Now, what's in this?
Oh, a little of this and a little of that. Open
It's sugar isn't it?
[shouts]
I'm in the placebo group.
[last lines]
So there go, you have your happy ending. Now get out! Because nowhere on your ticket does it say that you can sleep here!
I just heard about this new drug that makes you happy, I just wanna say,
[long pause]
... FUCK happy!
So what does this whole story mean? The only way to be happy is to know you won't be happy every single day. Lalalalalala. It sounds better in the original Croatian.
Your drug is effectively changing the world for the better. It's important that you know that. Have you heard that crack is gone? Crime is down... and oddly enough, so is tourism.
The drug was for people who couldn't get off the floor.
I want to be a scientist just like you. Any advice?
Er... work hard and stay in school!
Doesn't anyone want to know how the drug works chemically?
May I have the room for a moment? My empire is CRUMBLING!
I think I may have something.
This is the real party, Chris.
Please don't take my monkeys!

[as he's dragged away]
It was only a couple of flipper-babies!
Can I get you anything else? Grappa, wine, cappuccino, tickets to a Lakers game?
No, thanks.
Are you sure? What about cheesecake? Double-A batteries? Land in Montana?
No, thank you.
I offer you these, but they'll be yours anyway. Do you understand?
Life is short and life is shit and soon it will be over!
Come on, girls, let's go and sign those papers that say last night never happened.
And may I say I think it's a damn shame your husband's out cruising for gay sex when he has a piece of fine-ass woman like you at home?
Well... thanks, I guess.
I'm sorry, I don't speak German.

[subtitled]
The nipples of mother fortune have run dry...
Hey, make way for a real Human Being!
Smile, it's free!
